sc_api_tools.deployment.prediction_converters package

Module contents

sc_api_tools.deployment.prediction_converters.convert_classification_output(model_output: List[List[Tuple[int, float]]], labels: List[sc_api_tools.data_models.label.Label]) → sc_api_tools.data_models.predictions.Prediction

Convert the output of an OpenVINO inference model for a classification task to a Prediction object

Parameters

  • model_output – Nested list of classification results produced by a model for a classification task, for a single image

  • labels – List of labels belonging to the task

Returns

Prediction instance holding the prediction results

sc_api_tools.deployment.prediction_converters.convert_detection_output(model_output: List[openvino.model_zoo.model_api.models.utils.Detection], image_width: int, image_height: int, labels: List[sc_api_tools.data_models.label.Label]) → sc_api_tools.data_models.predictions.Prediction

Convert the output of an OpenVINO inference model for a detection task to a Prediction object

Parameters

  • model_output – Nested list of Detections produced by a model for a detection task

  • image_width – Width of the image (in pixels) to which the prediction applies

  • image_height – Height of the image (in pixels) to which the prediction applies

  • labels – List of labels belonging to the task

Returns

Prediction instance holding the prediction results

sc_api_tools.deployment.prediction_converters.convert_anomaly_classification_output(model_output: numpy.ndarray, anomalous_label: sc_api_tools.data_models.label.Label, normal_label: sc_api_tools.data_models.label.Label) → sc_api_tools.data_models.predictions.Prediction

Convert the output of an OpenVINO inference model for a classification task to a Prediction object

Parameters

  • model_output – Nested list of classification results produced by a model for a classification task, for a single image

  • anomalous_label – Label that should be assigned to ‘Anomalous’ instances

  • normal_label – Label that should be assigned to ‘Normal’ instances

Returns

Prediction instance holding the prediction results

sc_api_tools.deployment.prediction_converters.convert_segmentation_output(model_output: numpy.ndarray, labels: List[sc_api_tools.data_models.label.Label], soft_prediction: Optional[numpy.ndarray] = None) → sc_api_tools.data_models.predictions.Prediction

Creates polygons from the soft predictions. Background label will be ignored and not be converted to polygons.

Parameters

  • model_output – hard prediction containing the final label index per pixel. This is the prediction output produced after postprocessing from the model

  • labels – List of labels in the segmentation task

  • soft_prediction – Optional soft prediction with shape H x W x N_labels, where soft_prediction[:, :, 0] is the soft prediction for background. If soft_prediction is of H x W shape, it is assumed that this soft prediction will be applied for all labels. If left as None, the probability for each shape cannot be computed and will therefore be returned as 0

Returns

Prediction containing the output of the model
